sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Voya Investment Management LLC Sells 90,742 Shares of AvePoint, Inc. $AVPT
feed.summary: Voya Investment Management LLC significantly reduced its stake in AvePoint, Inc. by 17.5% in the third quarter, selling 90,742 shares and now holding 427,833 shares valued at approximately $6.42 million. Insider selling has also been prevalent, with 181,848 shares worth around $2.69 million sold in the last three months, though insiders still own 26.19% of the company. Despite missing Q3 EPS estimates, analysts maintain a "Moderate Buy" rating with an average target price of $19.03, while the stock currently trades at $13.60.

feed.title: AvePoint, Inc. $AVPT Shares Sold by Squarepoint Ops LLC
feed.summary: Squarepoint Ops LLC significantly reduced its stake in AvePoint, Inc. ($AVPT) by 69.7%, selling 266,661 shares. Insiders, including Chairman Xunkai Gong, also offloaded shares totaling over $3.2 million in the last 90 days. Despite missing EPS estimates, AvePoint surpassed revenue forecasts, and analysts maintain a "Moderate Buy" rating with an average target price of $19.03.

feed.title: 139,504 Shares in AvePoint, Inc. $AVPT Bought by TT International Asset Management LTD
feed.summary: TT International Asset Management LTD recently acquired 139,504 shares of AvePoint, Inc. (NASDAQ:AVPT) valued at approximately $2.09 million, making it their 28th-largest holding. Despite significant insider selling totaling $86.95 million in the last 90 days, insiders still maintain a 26.19% ownership. AvePoint's recent earnings reported a revenue beat but an EPS miss, with analysts maintaining a "Moderate Buy" consensus and an average price target of $19.03.

feed.title: 211,926,808 Common Stock of AvePoint, Inc. are subject to a Lock-Up Agreement Ending on 16-DEC-2025.
feed.summary: 211,926,808 common shares of AvePoint, Inc. are subject to a lock-up agreement that will end on December 16, 2025. This lock-up period is for 91 days, starting from September 16, 2025. Selling securityholders have agreed not to sell or publicly announce an intention to sell these shares without prior written consent from UBS Securities LLC.

feed.title: 316,020 Shares in AvePoint, Inc. $AVPT Bought by Castleark Management LLC
feed.summary: Castleark Management LLC recently purchased 316,020 shares of AvePoint, Inc. (NASDAQ:AVPT) valued at approximately $6.10 million during the second quarter, establishing a 0.15% stake in the company. Despite significant insider selling totaling $86.95 million in the last quarter, insiders still maintain a 26.19% ownership. AvePoint holds a "Moderate Buy" consensus rating with a target price of $19.03, and the stock is trading around $13.89 after missing EPS estimates but beating revenue expectations last quarter.

feed.title: AvePoint, Inc. (NASDAQ:AVPT) Receives Consensus Recommendation of "Moderate Buy" from Brokerages
feed.summary: AvePoint, Inc. (NASDAQ:AVPT) has received a "Moderate Buy" consensus recommendation from fifteen brokerages, with an average 12-month price target of $19.03. The company recently reported Q3 EPS of $0.06, missing estimates by $0.01, but exceeded revenue expectations with $109.73 million. Despite recent insider selling, institutional investors show significant interest in the company's stock.

feed.title: AvePoint (AVPT) Is Up 6.6% After Analyst Upgrades and Top Zacks Rank Signal Renewed Optimism
feed.summary: AvePoint (AVPT) recently saw its stock price rise by 6.6% following analyst upgrades and a top Zacks Rank, indicating renewed optimism about its profitability. This positive shift in sentiment for AvePoint, which specializes in data governance and security, underscores the company's efforts to address complex risks arising from AI and multi-cloud adoption, particularly within the Microsoft ecosystem. Despite this momentum, the company's strong reliance on Microsoft remains a key concentration risk for investors to monitor.

feed.title: AvePoint Launches New AvePoint AgentPulse Command Center to Bring Security Controls to AI Agents
feed.summary: AvePoint has launched AvePoint AgentPulse Command Center, an AI agent registry designed to enhance security and cost efficiency for organizations utilizing AI agents. This platform provides comprehensive visibility into AI agent activity, usage, and access to sensitive data, helping mitigate security risks and manage unexpected costs. AgentPulse integrates with the AvePoint Confidence Platform, offering advanced AI governance capabilities across various AI agent types.

feed.title: Quantbot Technologies LP Grows Stock Holdings in AvePoint, Inc. $AVPT
feed.summary: Quantbot Technologies LP significantly increased its stake in AvePoint, Inc. by 6,801% in Q2, acquiring an additional 302,577 shares to hold a total of 307,026 shares valued at approximately $5.93 million. This comes despite significant insider selling activities last quarter, where insiders sold 5,720,780 shares worth about $86.95 million. AvePoint reported mixed Q2 earnings, missing EPS estimates but exceeding revenue expectations, and currently holds a "Moderate Buy" analyst rating with an average target price of $19.03.

feed.title: 40,401 Shares in AvePoint, Inc. $AVPT Purchased by Okabena Investment Services Inc.
feed.summary: Okabena Investment Services Inc. recently purchased 40,401 shares of AvePoint, Inc. (NASDAQ:AVPT) valued at approximately $780,000, as disclosed in their latest 13F filing. Despite this institutional buying, the company has seen significant insider selling, with 5,720,780 shares sold in the last three months. AvePoint currently trades near $12.99, and analysts hold a "Moderate Buy" consensus rating with an average target price of $19.03, even though the company recently missed EPS estimates but beat revenue forecasts.

feed.title: Sierra Summit Advisors LLC Purchases Shares of 41,662 AvePoint, Inc. $AVPT
feed.summary: Sierra Summit Advisors LLC acquired 41,662 shares of AvePoint, Inc. (NASDAQ:AVPT) during the second quarter, valued at approximately $804,000. This purchase contributed to the overall institutional ownership of AvePoint reaching roughly 44.49%. The article also notes substantial insider selling by CEO Tianyi Jiang and a director, despite analysts maintaining a "Moderate Buy" rating with an average price target of $19.03 for the stock.

feed.title: Avepoint Inc stock hits 52-week low at 12.44 USD By Investing.com
feed.summary: Avepoint Inc (AVPT) recently hit a 52-week low of $12.44, representing a significant downturn despite holding more cash than debt and analysts expecting net income and revenue growth this year. The company's Q3 2025 earnings showed mixed results, missing EPS expectations but exceeding revenue forecasts. Consequently, some analysts have lowered their price targets, though maintaining Overweight/Outperform ratings, citing strong operating margins and a federal slowdown.

feed.title: Allworth Financial LP Grows Position in AvePoint, Inc. $AVPT
feed.summary: Allworth Financial LP significantly increased its stake in AvePoint, Inc. (NASDAQ:AVPT) by 27,215.6% in Q2, acquiring 24,494 additional shares. Despite this institutional accumulation, AvePoint's CEO and CFO sold substantial portions of their holdings in September, totaling over $34 million. The company recently missed EPS expectations but exceeded revenue forecasts, and analysts currently have a "Moderate Buy" rating with a consensus price target of $19.03.

feed.title: AvePoint Launches AgentPulse Command Center to Enhance AI Agent Security and Cost Management
feed.summary: AvePoint has unveiled the AgentPulse Command Center, an AI agent registry integrated into its Confidence Platform, to help organizations manage the security and cost of AI agents. The tool provides visibility into AI agent activity, sensitive file access, and cost drivers to mitigate risks and avoid unexpected expenses. This launch addresses the rising security threats and data governance challenges associated with the rapid deployment of AI agents.

feed.title: AvePoint Secures Insider Trading Exemptions from Singapore Authority
feed.summary: AvePoint, Inc. (AVPT) has secured exemptions from the Monetary Authority of Singapore regarding certain insider trading provisions under the Securities and Futures Act. These exemptions permit the company and specified executives to engage in stock repurchase and trading activities in line with U.S. regulations. This move is expected to enhance AvePoint's operational flexibility and market positioning, as the company specializes in cloud-based solutions for data management and collaboration.

feed.title: Earnings call transcript: AvePoint Q3 2025 earnings miss EPS forecast, stock dips
feed.summary: AvePoint Inc. reported mixed results for Q3 2025, missing EPS forecasts at $0.06 (vs. $0.07 expected) but exceeding revenue expectations with $109.7 million. Despite robust SaaS growth and strategic advancements in AI and data protection, the company's stock declined by over 3%, reflecting investor concerns over the EPS miss. AvePoint maintains its full-year ARR target, navigating public sector uncertainties while emphasizing prudent, profitable growth.

feed.title: AvePoint to Participate in Upcoming Investor Conferences
feed.summary: AvePoint announced its participation in several upcoming investor conferences, including presentations at Wells Fargo, RBC Capital Markets, and UBS Global Technology and AI conferences in November and December 2025. The company will also attend Needham Tech Week and Northland Capital Markets Growth Conference virtually. Live and archived webcasts of the presentations will be available on AvePoint's Investor Relations website.

feed.title: AvePoint, Inc. (NASDAQ:AVPT) Q3 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
feed.summary: AvePoint, Inc. (NASDAQ:AVPT) reported strong Q3 2025 earnings, surpassing revenue and non-GAAP operating income guidance. The company highlighted its focus on governing agentic AI, emphasizing visibility, unified protection, and responsible AI practices to mitigate risks and enhance operational efficiency for customers. Despite uncertainties in the public sector, AvePoint maintained its full-year ARR guidance while raising revenue and operating income expectations, demonstrating confidence in its profitable growth strategy and long-term targets.

feed.title: AvePoint (AVPT) executive chairman Gong Xunkai sells $834,668 in stock
feed.summary: AvePoint's Executive Chairman, Gong Xunkai, sold a substantial amount of company stock totaling $834,668 on November 3rd and 4th, 2025, under a pre-arranged trading plan. Despite these sales, the company's shares are trading slightly above their Fair Value, and several investment firms have initiated or reiterated positive ratings for AvePoint (AVPT) due to its market positioning and potential in AI and data backup. Gong Xunkai still indirectly owns over 15 million shares through trusts and LLCs following these transactions.

feed.title: Earnings Beat: AvePoint, Inc. Just Beat Analyst Forecasts, And Analysts Have Been Updating Their Models
feed.summary: AvePoint, Inc. (NASDAQ:AVPT) reported strong Q3 results, beating revenue expectations by 3.8% and statutory profit forecasts by an impressive 157%. Analysts have subsequently updated their models, with considerable lifts to earnings per share expectations for 2026, despite a slight decrease in the average price target. The company's revenue growth is also projected to outpace the broader industry.

feed.title: Jennison Associates LLC Buys 786,016 Shares of AvePoint, Inc. $AVPT
feed.summary: Jennison Associates LLC increased its stake in AvePoint, Inc. by 37.0% during Q2, purchasing 786,016 additional shares and bringing its total ownership to 2.9 million shares valued at $56.16 million. This comes amidst significant insider selling, with CEO Tianyi Jiang and a director selling over 2 million and 650,000 shares respectively. AvePoint currently holds a "Moderate Buy" consensus rating from analysts, with a price target range of $17.00 to $22.00.

feed.title: AvePoint Expands Data Protection Capabilities for Azure and Partners with IAMCP to Enhance Security and Efficiency
feed.summary: AvePoint has announced an expansion of its data protection capabilities for Azure within its AvePoint Elements platform, aiming to improve end-customer security and assist service providers in managing Azure environments. The company has also formed a strategic partnership with the International Association of Microsoft Channel Partners (IAMCP) to bolster its global channel business and support IAMCP members in scaling their operations. These initiatives, along with new marketplace integrations, seek to streamline procurement and management for partners, addressing evolving IT demands and fostering new revenue opportunities.

feed.title: AvePoint Share Offering and Stabilization Update
feed.summary: AvePoint has announced that it has ceased price stabilization actions related to a share offering, following significant share purchases. The over-allotment option was partially exercised to cover over-allotted shares, with the closing expected around October 24, 2025. UBS AG, Singapore Branch acted as the Stabilizing Manager for the offering.

feed.title: AvePoint’s Secondary Listing on SGX-ST and Stabilizing Actions
feed.summary: AvePoint has announced a secondary listing of its shares on the main board of the Singapore Exchange Securities Trading Limited (SGX-ST). UBS AG, Singapore Branch, acted as the Stabilizing Manager and purchased 9,240 shares of AvePoint’s common stock at S$18.10 to stabilize the offering. This strategic move aims to expand the company's market presence and boost investor confidence in the region.

feed.title: AvePoint Stabilizes Share Offering on SGX-ST - TipRanks
feed.summary: AvePoint has announced stabilization actions for its secondary listing on the Singapore Exchange Securities Trading Limited (SGX-ST). UBS AG, Singapore Branch, acting as the Stabilizing Manager, purchased 510 shares of AvePoint’s common stock in the open market at S$18.84 to support the offering and maintain share price stability. This move is part of the company’s efforts during its listing process.

feed.title: AvePoint Announces Secondary Listing on SGX-ST
feed.summary: AvePoint, Inc. has announced its secondary listing on the Singapore Exchange Securities Trading Limited (SGX-ST) Main Board, in addition to its existing Nasdaq listing under the ticker 'AVPT'. This move aims to expand AvePoint's market presence and offer more liquidity options for investors. The shares were priced at US$15.96 on Nasdaq as of September 18, 2025, and a recent analyst rating maintained a Buy with a $22.00 price target.

feed.title: First-Ever Nasdaq-SGX Dual Listing: AvePoint Makes History as Pioneer B2B SaaS Stock on Singapore Exchange
feed.summary: AvePoint (NASDAQ: AVPT, SGX: AVP) has achieved a historic dual listing on the Singapore Exchange (SGX), becoming the first B2B SaaS company on SGX and the first company to be dual-listed on both Nasdaq and SGX. The company successfully completed a secondary offering at SGD 19.50 per share, which was oversubscribed three times with support from 40 institutional investors. This strategic move aims to expand AvePoint's customer, partner, and investor base, particularly within the Asia Pacific region, leveraging Singapore as its Asia Headquarters and International R&D Hub.

feed.title: AvePoint Announces Dual Listing on the Singapore Exchange to Continue Global Expansion
feed.summary: AvePoint has announced its dual listing on the Singapore Exchange (SGX), making it the first B2B SaaS stock on SGX and the first company dual-listed on Nasdaq and SGX. This move aims to expand AvePoint's global footprint, particularly in Asia, and follows a successful secondary offering that was more than three times oversubscribed. The company's Singapore presence already serves as its Asia Headquarters and International R&D Hub.

feed.title: 13.3M Shares at $19.50: Data Security Leader AvePoint Announces Landmark Singapore Exchange Dual Listing
feed.summary: AvePoint (NASDAQ: AVPT), a data security and governance company, announced the pricing of a public offering of 13,290,360 shares at $19.50 each. This offering is by selling stockholders in connection with the company's planned dual listing on the Singapore Exchange (SGX-ST), where its shares will trade under the symbol "AVP" starting September 19, 2025. AvePoint will not receive any proceeds from this secondary offering, which aims to establish a market on the SGX-ST and expand its investor base.

feed.title: AvePoint (AVPT) Swings to Profit and Lifts Guidance—Is Operational Momentum Here to Stay?
feed.summary: AvePoint (AVPT) reported a swing to profit with US$2.7 million in net income and raised its full-year revenue guidance to US$406.6–410.6 million for 2025, signaling strong operational execution and demand. This improved outlook reduces concerns about competition and reinforces the company's investment narrative centered on growing enterprise needs for secure, compliant data management. The company anticipates significant revenue and earnings growth by 2028, with a fair value estimate suggesting a substantial upside.

feed.title: AvePoint to Announce Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results on August 7
feed.summary: AvePoint (NASDAQ: AVPT) will report its second-quarter 2025 financial results on Thursday, August 7, 2025, after U.S. financial markets close. The company will host a conference call at 4:30 PM ET with CEO and Co-Founder Dr. Tianyi Jiang and CFO Jim Caci to discuss results, business trends, and conduct a Q&A session. A live webcast of the call will be available on AvePoint's Investor Relations website.

feed.title: AvePoint Announces First Quarter 2025 Financial Results
feed.summary: AvePoint reported strong financial results for Q1 2025, with SaaS revenue growing 34% year-over-year to $68.9 million and total revenue increasing by 25% to $93.1 million. The company's total ARR reached $345.5 million, up 26% year-over-year, and it achieved GAAP operating income of $3.3 million. AvePoint also provided an optimistic financial outlook for Q2 and the full year 2025, anticipating continued revenue and ARR growth.

feed.title: Building a Global Tech Empire from Singapore: Tianyi Jiang's Vision for AvePoint
feed.summary: Dr. Tianyi Jiang, Co-founder and CEO of AvePoint, has established Singapore as a strategic hub for the enterprise solutions provider, focusing on data security and governance amid growing AI adoption. The company launched a S$100 million international R&D hub and an AI Lab in Singapore, leveraging the country's strong regulatory environment, talent pool, and pro-business policies to drive innovation and IP generation. Jiang also plans to spin off specialized ventures from Singapore to address industry verticals, such as MaivenPoint for EdTech.

feed.title: AvePoint Insiders Selling US$686k In Stock Relieved As Market Cap Slides To US$3.3b
feed.summary: AvePoint insiders sold US$686k worth of stock over the last year at an average price of US$9.81 per share, even as the company's market cap slid by US$448m. The largest single sale was by CFO James Caci for US$362k, representing 8.6% of his holding. Despite the selling, insiders still own a significant 37% of the company, valued at US$1.2b.

feed.title: Software firm AvePoint said to weigh second listing in Singapore
feed.summary: AvePoint, a US infrastructure software firm listed on Nasdaq, is reportedly considering a second listing in Singapore to be closer to its South-east Asian backers like 65 Equity Partners. This potential move aligns with Singapore's efforts to revitalize its stock market by attracting more listings and addressing low liquidity. AvePoint's shares have risen 34% in New York this year, giving the company a market value of over US$2 billion.

feed.title: AvePoint (Nasdaq:AVPT) - Stock Analysis
feed.summary: This Simply Wall St analysis provides an overview of AvePoint (AVPT), a cloud-native data management software platform. It highlights that the stock is currently undervalued, with strong forecasted earnings growth but also notes risks like insider selling and past shareholder dilution. The report details AvePoint's financial health, growth prospects, and recent news, positioning it as an essential provider for enterprise data governance.
